title: Update Event details
name: UpdateEvent
description: Edit/Update the event for the planner with current authorization token. Location id is optional, if the id is specified it updates the location else a new location is created.This endpoint should only be called with the Planner's authorization token

Response:

     "id": "5aaa41c8b854660004011b60",

title: List Guest Invitations
name: ListGuestInvites
description: List all events a guest is invited to

examples.title: Response:

Custom Response Header.description:
Status code about the profile.
110: Indicates that the user with the authorization token as has been registered on the platform to another user role. But not as an event vendor. Also an HTTP Status of 204 is returned.
120: Indicates the user has incomplete profile information an may require update.
130: Indicated the user has a complete profile information.

title: Create New Invitation
name: CreateInvitation
description: Use this endpoint to create a invitation. This endpoint tries to get the guest user being invited from the provided email or phone number, and if no user matches this information. Then a new guest user is created.

Parameters.description: guest phone number(either phone or email should be provided for sending out notification).
guest email address(either phone or email should be provided for sending out notification).

examples.title: Response:

Error 4xx.description: The current user with the authorization token doesn't have access to this endpoint.
The current item you are trying to access doesn't exist.

title: Edit/Update Invitation
name: UpdateInvitation
description: Use this endpoint to update invitation information. This endpoint tries to get the guest user being invited from the provided email or phone number, and if no user matches this information. Then a new guest user is created. The endpoint requires the authenticated user should have a planner role

Request Header.description: Authorization token for PLANNER user from firebase authentication.

Parameters.description: guest phone number(either phone or email should be provided for sending out notification).
guest email address(either phone or email should be provided for sending out notification).

Custom Response Header.description:
Status code about the profile.
110: Indicates that the user with the authorization token as has been registered on the platform to another user role. But not as an event planner. Also an HTTP Status of 204 is returned.
120: Indicates the user has incomplete profile information an may require update.
130: Indicated the user has a complete profile information.
